description:
After the Skaven, it's now the Stormcast Eternals' turn to receive a massive influx of new models for the 4th Edition of Warhammer Age of Sigmar. In part 1 of our mega review, we take a closer look at the first half of the new releases, including high-resolution sprue images and all the possible build options.

The post Review: Stormcast Eternals Lord-Celestant, Reclusians, Stormstrike Palladors, Iridan the Witness appeared first on Tale of Painters.
title: Review: Stormcast Eternals Lord-Celestant, Reclusians, Stormstrike Palladors, Iridan the Witness
